Name: embeeIndresh
Title: Beautiful and high positive vibes religious temple of Kaali maths
Review: It’s a religious historical site . You will feel Beautiful vibrations and this where Great poetKalidas got enlightened. Also you must visit kalabhairava temple nearby

Name: dimpoo1971
Title: Very calm and peaceful Temple
Review: Very calm and peaceful place.Its a small temple on the outskirts of Ujjain.I went during last few days of Shrawan month and their was no rush and one can have pleasant darshan of Maa Gadkalika.

Name: Surya Katakam
Title: Popularly known as the Goddess of Tantra Mantra
Review: Gadkalika temple is located on the road leading to Shri Kalabhairav temple. We visited Kalabhairav temple first and then in return we had Maa Darshan here. This temple is situated in between Kalabhairav and Mahakal temple. its @ 4 km away from Mahakal temple and 2.5 km from Kalabhairav temple.It is believed that the deity in this temple is worshipped by Poet Kalidas. The legend goes that the great poet Kalidas was originally uneducated, but  with his great devotion to the goddess Gadkalika here, he acquired unparalleled literary skills. Specialty of this temple:1. This temple is popularly called as Ujjain Mahakali2. This temple is one of the eighteen Shakti peethas where the upper lip of goddess sati fell here.3.  This temple is located near the village of Gad, hence this temple is famous with the name Gadkalika Mandir. 4. In this temple Maa Durga is situated in the form of Kalika. In the sanctum Maa Face is highlighted and clearly visible along with decorated ornaments. 5. Kalika Devi in this temple is different from other Kalika' s idol such that it is in saffron color rather than black color.6. It is claimed that this Maa Gadkalika is here since Satyuga.Temple timings:Morning 06:00 to Evening 09:00

Name: KeshavChakraborty
Title: Jai Gadkalika Mata: Shakti Peeth
Review: This temple is considered as one of the Shati peethas and also famous among tourists.Face of Goddess is very much bright and lively.

Name: SudarshanKS
Title: A shakthi temple
Review: A very nice shakthi temple, although not part of 18 shakthipeethas. A very nice godess idol, very pleasing to have darshan

Name: abkush
Title: A different roop of Maa Kali
Review: One of the two shaktipeeths in Ujjain.The temple is around 5Kms from Mahakaleshwar Temple. The face of Maa Kali is unlike any other Kali temple I've seen till now.There was not much crowd, when we visited, so darshan was very quick.

Name: skdel2016
Title: One of the  Maha Shakti peetha
Review: It's one of the maha shaktee peetha . When you enter the place you will feel  different waves which relaxes you. A must visit place. Jai mahakali.

Name: AnshumanMaini
Title: Good very short visit
Review: Good place and it took us only 30 seconds to complete the visit because of covid times. Nothing much but one has to go because Goddess gave darshan here to Kalidas.

Name: Gdj
Title: Gad kalika temple
Review: Most famous mata temple in ujjain.a lot of devotees visited temple in navratries.place located at bhairogarh area of ujjain city.

Name: hipiyush007
Title: Mesmerizing temle of Maa kaali
Review: When I enter the temple , I was in a shock and mesmarzed with the beauty of maa kali moorti (statue). I have never seen this kind of form of maa kali. I felt like i was in another world for few mins. Very calm and heavenly place. Must visit place.Do offer 108 lemon maala which is readily available in prshaad ghar outside temple.

Name: Sourav B
Title: Gadkalika Temple
Review: Its a small temple on the outskirts of Ujjain. Though has significance for travelers and locals. Shall take around an hour to finish the entire darshan.

Name: Abhi62001
Title: Devi who blessed Kalidasa
Review: Kalika devi means goddess with dark skin. She is the presiding deity in Ujjain, who wrote beejakshar on the tongue of Kalidasa and made him a great poet. Kumkum archana is done here. No much crowd and parking is easy. Many people offer her bangles, rice and other things for the wellbeing and to get good education for their children.

Name: Raghuraman N
Title: Gadkalika Temple Ujjaini - Sakthi Peet. (Part of Body Upper Lipes) Bhairave name (Kala Gora Bhairava )
Review: Very Power full god. Sakthi Peeth,  (Part of Body Upper Lips) nearby temple there’s a Bhairava Temple. No one Awear it's related to This Devi. When you visit this Devi, you have to visit the Bhairava Temple.Bhairava name (Kala Gora Bhairava ) I attach the Photos of Bhairava Temple.

Name: Sivakumar V
Title: A Historical Temple
Review: Situated ear the bharthihari cave and on the banks of the Shipra River is this temple for Goddess kali. It is said that the Maha Kavi Kalidas got inspiration to pen his monumental works in literature.This is not labelled as Sakthi peetam.A small but beautiful well maintained temple. For the importance it has in history , it is a must-see in Ujjain

Name: vinay760
Title: Ujjain Darshan
Review: Very powerful Shkati temple and historic , beautiful temple and devi darsh . this is also must visit for all and it is historically connected with story of Kalidas  who was one of the Gem of Vikramaditya king,  This is clean and nice temple with lots of space for parking etc.

Name: Gdj
Title: Famous mata temple in ujjain
Review: Most famous devi temple in bhairugarh area of ujjain.a lot of devtte visits temple everyday. In every navratri very crowd seen in this temple.

Name: Santosh K
Title: Good place
Review: Very nice and calm place to visit in Ujjain and also very nicely maintained by staff. A must visit place.

Name: Himanshu Bhatt
Title: Durga Mata tample
Review: Its one its kind of unique temple situated at the outskirt of city location surrounded with green fields. Its overcrowded during navratri season. many devotees comes across india to visit this place.

Name: Gdj
Title: Mata gadkalika templd ujjain
Review: Mata gadkalika temple situated in bhargarh area of ujjain city. I visited temple on navratri. A lot of people worshipped there.

Name: Giri S
Title: Visit to Gadkalika temple
Review: wonderful experience. Was able to perform kumkum pooja maa gadkalika on Friday. No rush and one can have pleasant darshan of maa gadkalika.

Name: trivediar
Title: Amazing & Pious
Review: We went there in the evening and were lucky enough to be witness  of Sandhya Aarti. It was superb experience as the instruments like, Dhol, Tasha, Nagara, Drums, Bells were so synchronized that created amazing experience! Mata Gadhkalika's Darshan was the most inspiring experience!

Name: Sanjaykumar P V
Title: Historical importance
Review: Temple worshipped by poet Kalidasa and historically important. Small and significant in history.  Good to spend some time

Name: rathod2017
Title: Gadkalika Temple
Review: Gadkalika Temple, this is a temple of kalika. but so many idols of god and goddess are also there. this one is the historical place in ujjain.

Name: Neelamraju
Title: Kali Mandir
Review: One of the must see places when you visit Ujjain apart from other tourist attractions and places of pilgrimage is Gadkalika Temple.The idol in the temple of Gadkalika, is supposed to have been worshipped by Kalidasa. It is said that Kalidasa was an uneducated person and it was due to his dedication to Goddess Kalika that he earned her blessings and also acquired unparalleled literary skills. GadKalika is considered to be one of the Shakthi Peethas.We were at the right time for Aarti close to the afternoon and were able to offer Kumkumarchan ( a pooja with Sindhoor to the Goddess) as well as participate musical beats by a special set of devotees playing Drums and the Temple Bells..The drums and bells were so excellent to hear that we got carried away by clapping as hard as we could in rhythm (We all had sore hands after that!!). It was an amazing experience.We have actually compiled a list of Shakti Peethas and Jyothirlingas and hopefully be able to visit all of them..

Name: rush-tr
Title: Kalidasa found it very attractive back then, but not anything special today
Review: Surely Kalidasa saw the temple in its most simple form, and not today's florescent colours. The building itself is old but completely covered up with all the jazz that one sees in most religious places in India, and hence unattractive. It was said that Kalidasa achieved enlightenment here under a tree and used to spend lot of time in this temple.The temple is situated on outskirts (three to five km.away.), though not very far, perhaps four km from centre. Autos are easily available to reach there. but coming back may not be easy. It is better to hire auto that waits there. we reached right at the time of noon aarti. The drums and bells were blasting and a woman started getting into the rhythm of the music. It was an experience. If you have some time, it is fine to visit, but if you are tight on time, this temple can be easily missed. There are many temples in Ujjain, and most look similar. Unless you are religious and want to visit, it is fine.Though it is temple and is appropriate to wear modest clothes, but there is no dress code and any outfit is fine.

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: One of the 52 shakti peedams
Review: This is one of the 52 shakti peedams in India where the satis ELBOW believed to have fallen. The famous legend poet kalidas who was once a ordinary gained literally genius after getting the blessings from this peedams. This is one among the 18 famously important shakti peedams.its believed that KAMAKYA TEMPLE IN ASSAM IS THE CREATIVE SHAKTI while MANGALAGAURI IN GAYA IS THE PROTECTER AND MAHAKALI IN UJJAIN IS THE DESTROYER and all 3 lies in straight line.

Name: Hitesh Rathore
Title: Kali temple in outskirts
Review: This Kali temple is located in the outskirts of the city . nothing very special about it and you can actually skip this if you are visiting to explore

Name: meenakshimuthusamy
Title: Shakthi peedam
Review: It is a famous temple.The temple is very medium size temple.There is a resonable crowd of the visitors.

Name: babita13
Title: Gadkalika Temple
Review: the list of temples in Ujjain is very big. this is a one which is very neat and well maintained place. The Kali idol is very beautiful. . Must visit

Name: Namjoshi
Title: Gadkalika Mandir
Review: This is near Bhartruhari Gufa. This is related to Mahakavi Kalidasa. This was rebuilt by King Harshavardhan in 7th century and again by King Parmar from Malawa.

Name: Vamsidhar K
Title: Goddess power.
Review: This is one of the Shakthi Perth. Not much of publicity is done for this place but a clean, small place which will give you an instant feel of energy and serenity when visited. Must see.

Name: Jayashree G
Title: Kalidas’s Kali maa
Review: This is the Kali maa who bestowed knowledge on Kavi Kalidasa.  Her compassionate countenance fills one with peace and happiness.  Every visitor to Ujjain must visit this temple.  The temple sanctum sanctorum also has the moorthis of Lakshmi and Saraswathi.

Name: Dilip123
Title: An ancient temple of goddess Kali
Review: This is one of the most important and ancient temples in the city of Ujjain. This goddess was worshiped by the great Sanskrit poet Kalidasa. A board in the temple mentions that archaeological evidences that date back to BC era have been unearthed in this temple.A must visit for devotees and people interested in history.

Name: meghashyam
Title: Maa
Review: One of the three kaal temples , other two being mahakaleshwar and kaal bhairav temples . At this place the presiding deity blessed mahakavi kalidas and raja vikramaditya .It's one of the eighteen shakthipeeth .

Name: Krishnaveni S
Title: Kali worshiped by Kalidasa
Review: This is an ancient temple. The Kali idol is said to be of mahabharata age. The temple was built by king Harshavardhana and the present form it was built by Maharaj of Gwaliar. The Kali idol is very beautiful. Very neat and well maintained. Must visit

Name: Omkar P
Title: REVIEW OF GADKALIKA TEMPLE
Review: The temple is situated at very quiet place and statue of Kalika mata is in the temple. There are around 50 steps downward side.

Name: arunbvkumar
Title: Gadkalika Temple
Review: It is believed that Kalidas got wisdom at this place and is not a shaktipeeth but very important temple.

Name: Viral Arya
Title: Jai Maa Gadkalika
Review: A must visit and one of the famous temples in Ujjain. This temple is dedicated to goddess Maa Kaali. It is believed that Kalidas worshipped Maa Gadkalika, from which he gain knowledge.

Name: sandeeprchavda
Title: Shaktipith
Review: Must visit if you are in ujjain, clean and small temple dedivated to Godess Mahakali. It is one of the shaktipiths

Name: Himanshi_Saxena
Title: Goddess of Ujjain
Review: The temple is dedicated to Gadkalika Devi who is believed to be Goddess of Ujjain. The temple is one of the main attractions of the pious city.

Name: Ktishan Kant Lavania
Title: Jai Maa
Review: I visited this temple with my mother, she really like this temple, this temple is having history with great Poet Kalidas.

Name: UmaBG
Title: Jai Maa temple
Review: Very much famous temple in ujjain. I attended evening aarti and felt very auspicious and holly environment here. Temple is small but very much divine feeling is felt here. A must visit place in ujjain.

Name: DreamerDisha
Title: One of the many hundreds of temples in Ujjain
Review: How many of us know our own ‘Kul Dev/Devi’ ? Not many. I don’t . If I don’t know my own Devi, what interest will I have in Kalidas’s kul Devi. A Ganesh temple right next to this temple has a saying that Lord Rama established Ganesh here. But the energy of the place tells you it’s fake.

Name: nik_0107
Title: Godess Kali
Review: Really a great temple, it is said poet / writer Kalidas got his fame after getting the blessings of Goddess Gadkalika.

Name: Anjani S
Title: good temple to visit in evening
Review: nice Temple to see. best view you will get in evening. this is part of the package offered buy auto rickshaw drivers.

Name: Dev-Shiv on a Trip
Title: Poet Kalidas was Blessed here !
Review: This temple is famous since Poet/writer Kalidas became what he was after getting the blessings of Goddess Gadkalika. Enjoy the calm and peace. A steady stream of visitors is always there. Prasad shops are outside the complex. Very old and heritage temple with new construction surrounding it.

Name: chirag kothari
Title: Old Kali temple
Review: This temple is of maa kali and said to be one of the shakti peeth. It is said that poet kalidas attained knowledge on blessings of maa kali. We had great darshan at this temple.

Name: Ani De
Title: Beautiful face of kali
Review: The temple is very small and not atall maintained . But the goddess face is so beautiful that u will forget all the other things.

Name: samsamal
Title: Kali Inspired Kalidasa here
Review: Lively place in the midst of greenery and quite little village on outskirts of Ujjain. One needs to have own transport arrangements to visit here.Ample parking place outside teple with loo facilities. Footers not allowed inside. Very small temple, perhaps due to ravages of time.The beautiful deity known as Garh Kalika ( Garh meaning a fort in ancient times; and Kalika the presiding deity, the one who is dark skinned and the mother of Universe controlling the Time) Legend says the great poet Kalidada, who was illiterate and abandoned by his wife for being a dumb fool, used to visit, pray, meditated & did penance for years on years, With his devotion, Devi granted hum wisdom and rear is history. The poet thereafter carved masterpieces, among them Meghadootam is recommended.

Name: Bimal0401
Title: Have a Grace of Devi Gadkalika
Review: The Temple is an ancient one. The Gadkalika Devi is a Shaktipith and was a Kul-Devi of famous poet Shri Kalidasa. The temple is very very peaceful. There is no rush. The temple is very well maintained. Very neat and clean. Do not forget to offer prasad of liquor as done at Kal-Bhairav temple in Ujjain only. Not to miss masala nimbu soda near the temple. Must visit temple when at Ujjain.

Name: mehul vyas1999
Title: Kuldevi of kavi kalidash.
Review: Devi gadhkalika was the kuldevi of kavi ( poet) Kalidash. After blessed of devi he becomes pandit ( most educated person) in shanshkrit language,  and he wrote many poetry , poetry drama..  Inthis mandair evening aarti is attraction.

Name: Kingshuk P
Title: Old historical place
Review: Good to see such old historical place where Kalidas was associated. By look one can see it is old place. Well maintained

Name: sbgholse
Title: Mahakali-Shaktipeeth
Review: This is famous godess mahakali temple in Ujjain.It is associated with Kalidas and lord Ram.Its considered as very powerful godess.Alongwith it there is a temple of Lord Ganesh and Hanuman.The temple is small but beutiful and not so decorated.

Name: Vipin Arora
Title: Peaceful
Review: One of the Shaktipeeths situated in Ujjain. Nice ambience and peaceful. Good to visit at any time of the year

Name: Geeess
Title: History and legend
Review: The Goddess is worshipped here along with others.Her fame comes form the Ramayan where she is mentioned as Lord Rama returned victorious from war and rested nearby.Within the temple is the ancient mythological statue of Ganesha, in front of it is the ancient Hanuman temple. Vishnu has a magnificent quadrangular statue attached to it, which is wonderful and scenic.It is not one of Ujjain's iconic temples but is close to some of them and can be seen quickly

Name: S Balaji
Title: Boost of Sakthi (Sakthi peetam)
Review: Small is beautiful. Small temple but very beautiful deity. It's one of the Sakthi peetam and very powerful goddess. It is a must visit and not too far from the main city. If you in ujjain it's a must visit.

Name: PankajDeep
Title: One of very holy shaktipith of Mataji among 52 Shaktipith
Review: Very spiritual and holy experience while praying here.This is very famous and old Shaktipith among 52 Shaktipith.Must to visit.

Name: Sunil K
Title: Its a also nice temple to visit of
Review: Here Gadkalika temple is situated  which is also a shaktipeeth.its also a must place to visit for travelers.

Name: Sunil K
Title: Maa Kalika Shati Peeth
Review: The temple is just on the way to Bharthri Gufa and Kal Bhairav Temple. Very popular temple in Ujjain and must visit while in Ujjain. All facility like prashad and pooja samigri is available there like other temples. Very peaceful environment

Name: Nits90
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: Temple is beautiful and located at beautiful location too. You can find eateries opposite to temple. Not much rush there. And it's near Kal Bhairav temple.

Name: shivangm871
Title: Good temple
Review: Considered to be one of the Shakti Peeth of Hindu mythology, this old temple is comparatively less explored. Needs some kind renovation.

Name: Lalit Surjan
Title: An Ancient temple
Review: In the city of temples that is Ujjain this is yet another ancient temple dedicated to Goddess Durga, worshipped by Mahakavi Kalidas but there is no trace of its past glory except three large stone carvings that need cleaning, restoration and conservation.

Name: sanjayvora45
Title: Goddess Kalika
Review: Near to Mangalnath and sandipani ashram this Gadkalika temple is dedicated to Goddess Kalika. Deity here was worshipped by Kalidas. Area is Silent and Bhruthari caves is nearby.

Name: uday s
Title: Kalidas and Kalika
Review: This temple is dedicated to Kalidasa and his beloved Goddess. This is one of the most famous temples around.

Name: ShvRm_Traveller
Title: Popular temple dedicated to Goddess
Review: This is relative a small but popular temple dedicated to Goddess Kalika in the town of Ujjain. The temple has a historical significance and the great poet Kalidas was known to be a devotee of the goddess.

Name: GLOBALSEAS
Title: oldest temple of kaalima
Review: one of the oldest temple of kaalimaa in ujjain the shakti peeth .. felt happy ..by doing darshan of kaalimaa

Name: traveller_prk
Title: Town goddess revered by the locals
Review: Small but a great temple. She is also supposedly the protector of the town and revered by the locals. W were told that visit to Ujjain would be incomplete without taking her blessings.

Name: ramki09
Title: ancient temple
Review: gadkalika temple is a kali mandir.kali Devi is a very powerful Goddess.Poet kalidas whose verses were once quite ordinary gained popularity by blessings of gadkalika

Name: ChennaiFocus
Title: Devi who blessed Kalidas
Review: A must see temple, devi just does not move away from our eyes with the cute gold colored teeth, Devi in this is one of the Kali peetam of the 18 peetams across India.

Name: DrArunAgrawal
Title: Ancient temple in outer Ujjain that must be visited
Review: Gadkalika temple is an ancient temple located close to the banks of river Shipra ,   away from the hustle and bustle of the City. The deity in this temple is believed to have been worshipped by the famous poet Kalidasa. The legend goes that he was an idiot and it is by his devotion to the goddess Kalika that he acquired great literary skills. Well worth a visit . Mangalnath temple and Maharshi Sadapani Ashram are also nearby .

Name: vaida17
Title: gadkalika temple
Review: this temple is dedicated to maa kali. this deity is reported to be self formed, and is in standing position.  Maa Kali devi appeared before Kalidasa, from king vikramaditya  periods, and wrote on his tongue and he became a world known poet. he was originally a shepherd, with no education. this temple is located around 5 miles from ujjain railway station.  generally this is not being found on the tourists spots at ujjain.  located at a calm locality with a handful of interested devotees.  the priests over there are quite cooperative and helpful

Name: JASVINDER1981
Title: Gadkalika Temple
Review: It is an Ancient temple of goddess Kali situated in outer Ujjain. The Temple is situated far away from city crowd in calm and beautiful environment.

Name: Raviraj
Title: Superb temple..
Review: It's very near to Ujjain. From Ujjain you can travel in Auto's they will charge 200-250 they will only show another 5-6 temples...

Name: tripfreak54
Title: Wisdom Gained!
Review: Gadkalika Temple is devoted to Goddess Kalika.  Apparently, Kalidasa ,the great poet received his poetic powers through his genuine devotion to this deity. Kalidasa served as advisor to Maharaja Vikramaditya. The Kali Maa here with her beautiful eyes is a joy to behold.

Name: VivekRastogi
Title: Divine Experience of Mother Kalika
Review: When you visit Ujjain, you can't miss the darshan and divine experience of Mother Kalika, During Navratri Mother Kali also have prasad of Wine. Please do visit the temple get blessed.

Name: RachanaR18
Title: The famous Ujjaini Mahakali temple
Review: This temple is the abode of the famous Ujjaini Mahakali. Though it is a small temple, it looks very beautiful and the Goddess is believed to be extremely powerful.

Name: Ashoklawyer
Title: Historic
Review: Powerful Deity GADKALIKA. This temple has the legend associated with Kalidas and King Vikramaditya. Historic place.

Name: Ankush Goel
Title: one of the 3 kaal temples
Review: The idol of goddess if full of energy and this is one of the 3 kaal temples. Mahakaal, Gadkaalika and Kaal Bhairav.

Name: priyankprudhvi
Title: GadKalika temple - One of the Shakthi peeth (1 of 18)
Review: Shakthi Peeth (1 of 18) temples which is having prominance that Kali devi's Upper lip was fallen here and came into existance from old days.

Name: raofca
Title: Be there for the aarthi
Review: Be sure to stay back for the evening aarthi at around sunset. The young folks mesmerize you with the drumbeats and you really can't keep wondering about the fervour with which they go about it.

Name: Rahul
Title: Beautiful temple.
Review: It's a beautiful temple on the way to Kal Bhairav temple. Would highly recommend a visit to this temple.

Name: AnirbanBasu
Title: Religious place of historial significance
Review: Gadkalika Temple has great religious and historical significance. Temple of Kali where the great poet Kalidas used to pray. The aarati in the evening attracts lot of devotees and performed with great fervour.

Name: AEFWON
Title: Mata ji ka mandir hain, jana hi padhega
Review: a bit lengthy trip from Ujjain city, but worth visitingI have seen few Telugu people spending their Dussehra time entirely here too.

Name: Rajasekhar T
Title: Ujjain trip
Review: This is the temple of maa Kali . One of the avatar of Shiva. It is a small temple. Beware of pandith ji. They can bluff you by telling to perform puja.

Name: yogindery
Title: Gadkalika Temple
Review: Gadkalika Temple is also very famous temple in sight seeing place in ujjain. very beautiful murti of maa gad kaalika situated there.

Name: Manish B
Title: Jai Mata Di
Review: The Gadkalika temple is situated 2 kms from main city and its easy to locate. The temple is said to be the place where great poet kalidas use to visit and worship and due to this he is got the blessings and become great poet. Ancient temple to visit. Calm and peaceful place to visit and worship.

Name: Chander S
Title: Powerful deity
Review: A shakti peeth where body part of Sati had fallen. good place for meditation with strong vibrations.

Name: BK_TheTraveller
Title: Jay Maa
Review: They say the visit to Ujjain is totally incomplete if you do not pay visit to three deities which have the word "Kal" in them. Mahakal, Kal Bhairav and Gadh Kalika. Must go place!!

Name: Sivanandam_mudhali
Title: Gagkalika Temple, Ujjain
Review: This is the temple located 5 km away form Ujjiain Railway station. You can visit this temple in Half day tour of Ujjina. This temple is on the way to Kaal Bhairav mandir, about 1-2 KM from here.This temple is believed to have worshiped by Kalidas, who acquired the literally skill by worshipping this goddess.We were fortunate to see aarti of maa kaali, very peaceful place. Please visit.

Name: banjara_abhi
Title: Where Kalidas did the worship
Review: After Harsiddhi temple nearby the Mahakaleshwar you gonna discover it bit away from main Ujjain city. If you gonna start Ujjain city tour your guide will start from here. Not much crowded but a lot of religious feeling will make you feel Jai Mata Di. The pindi of goddess seems adorable.

Name: HS-MISRA
Title: Historical Temple
Review: Garh Kalika Temple is very famous attraction of Ujjain and it falls on the route to Bhartrihari caves and other local sites of the city. This temple is famous as the renowned Sanskrit Poet Kalidas worshipped this goddess. It is said that it was the blessings of this goddess ( Kalika- a form of goddess Durga) that Kalidas became such a miraculous poet from his early foolish life. Overall the site is good.

Name: BhatiaSandy
Title: Awesome during Navratra
Review: Visited this temple in April 2016, just awesome, clean but hustle bustle of being this place in main city area. A must visit for every traveller in Ujjain.

Name: Naresh Prajapati
Title: Easy Darshan of MAA Kali ….
Review: Gadkalika Devi is worship of Great lyric poet Kalidas. Temple is very old. Temple renovate in 10th century by King Harshvardhan Rai. Gadkalika temple is small temple in Ujjain. Easily Darshan of matadi. You can also take photos & video of temple. Gadkalika temple is near to Shri Mahakal Temple of Ujjain.Spiritual Darshan of Devi Kali and there is very BIG Pallee with so many lamps on there. It is really nice look to see with lights.If you have time & want to spend there than it is OK, otherwise no need to add this place in Ujjain tourist place4-5 Small shops are available outside of temple to buy “Pooja Samagree”.Jay MAA KALI

Name: guddu1954
Title: mesmerizing deity
Review: The presiding deity is mesmerizing to the extent that you would come again and again to have darshan of the deity.A memorable experience.

Name: Radha S
Title: Gadkallika devi awesome
Review: I and my mother visited this temple. Great temple and goddess murti is so bright and lively. It's divine experience.

Name: EnakshiC
Title: Jai ma Kali!
Review: Goddess Kali is someone I have prayed to from childhood, and is a favorite goddess. So the opportunity to visit her temple in Ujjain could not be passed on. The idol is just her face, which the priest and everyone else prays to. It is similar to Kolkata's kalighat temple, where the torso of the goddess is prayed to. We spent sometime here, as it was a little crowded on Saturday. It is a nice temple. There is not too much space to sit and medicate though. Nice visit.

Name: simham
Title: Kalika Mandir
Review: The Mother Kali is said to have written Bijakshara on later Mahakavi Kalidas & blessed an ordinary person with enormous knowledge and poetic talents. Kalidas is said to have done upaasna here. The Temple has survived but the present structure is about 100 years old. Meditate here & find solace in the Mother

Name: cosmic_avi
Title: Normal temple. But my visit was worth it as I met a damru guy and got to play damru for the aarti
Review: Ujjain being city of shiva temples, it is very difficult to distinguish exceptional ones from normal ones. This for me, fell into the category of a normal temple. But had an amazing experience here. A guy named Mr Meena, goes around ujjain temples played by damrus during Aarti. He has 9 damrus floating around different temples. He happened to be at that temple while I was there and stroke a conversation. And it eventually turned out that I ended up playing Damru for the Arti.

Name: narasimham1949

Title: DEITY OF POET KALIDASA
Review: Gadkalika temple is on the out skirts of Ujjain. Temple is dedicated to Kali. Huge vermilion covered face with stretching tongue. It is said Kalidasa a famous poet who was idiot acquired literary skills by his devotion to Goddess.
